verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, earnestly <S%G816>beholding<s%> the <S%G4892>council<s%>, <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G4176>lived<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> before <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G367>Ananias<s%> <S%G2004>commanded<s%> them that stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G5180>smite<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on the <S%G4750>mouth<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3195>shall<s%> <S%G5180>smite<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, thou <S%G2867>whited<s%> <S%G5109>wall<s%>: <S%G2532>for<s%> <S%G2521>sittest<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2753>commandest<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to be <S%G5180>smitten<s%> contrary to the <S%G3891>law<s%>?
<S%G1161>And<s%> they that stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Revilest <S%G3058>thou<s%> <S%G2316>God's<s%> high <S%G749>priest<s%>?

<S%G5037>Then<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, I <S%G1492>wist<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> the high <S%G749>priest<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, Thou <S%G2046>shalt<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2046>speak<s%> <S%G2560>evil<s%> of the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1097>perceived<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G2076>were<s%> <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, he cried <S%G2896>out<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4892>council<s%>, <S%G435>Men<s%> and <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%>, the <S%G5207>son<s%> of a <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%>: <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am called in <S%G2919>question<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2980>had<s%> <S%G5124>so<s%> <S%G2980>said<s%>, there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G4714>dissension<s%> between the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> was <S%G4977>divided<s%>.

<S%G1063%G3303>For<s%> the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> that there <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G386>resurrection<s%>, <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%>, <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3670>confess<s%> <S%G297>both<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2906>cry<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> that were of the <S%G5330>Pharisees'<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G450>arose<s%>, and <S%G1264>strove<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, We <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> hath <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%>, let <S%G2313>us<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2313>fight<s%> against God.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4714>dissension<s%>, the chief <S%G5506>captain<s%>, <S%G2125>fearing<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> should have been pulled in <S%G1288>pieces<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2753>commanded<s%> the <S%G4753>soldiers<s%> to go <S%G2597>down<s%>, and to <S%G726>take<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> by <S%G726>force<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> to <S%G71>bring<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3925>castle<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1966>following<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> stood <S%G2186>by<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, Be of good <S%G2293>cheer<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> thou hast <S%G1263>testified<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4571>thou<s%> bear <S%G3140>witness<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G4516>Rome<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> banded <S%G4160%G4963>together<s%>, and <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> under a <S%G332>curse<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> that they <S%G5315>would<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193%G3739>till<s%> they had <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> more <S%G4119>than<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> had <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4945>conspiracy<s%>.

And <S%G3748>they<s%> came <S%G4334>to<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, We have <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> under a great <S%G331>curse<s%>, that we will <S%G1089>eat<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G2193%G3739>until<s%> we have <S%G615>slain<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>.

<S%G3568>Now<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G4892>council<s%> <S%G1718>signify<s%> to the chief <S%G5506>captain<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> he <S%G2609>bring<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> to <S%G839>morrow<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> though ye <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G1231>inquire<s%> something more <S%G197>perfectly<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%>, or <S%G4253>ever<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> come <S%G1448>near<s%>, <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> to <S%G337>kill<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G3972>Paul's<s%> <S%G79>sister's<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of their lying in <S%G1749>wait<s%>, he <S%G3854>went<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3925>castle<s%>, and <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1543>centurions<s%> unto him, and <S%G5346>said<s%>, <S%G520>Bring<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the chief <S%G5506>captain<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2192>hath<s%> a certain <S%G5100>thing<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G3767%G3303>So<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G71>brought<s%> him <S%G4314>to<s%> the chief <S%G5506>captain<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> unto him, and prayed <S%G2065>me<s%> to <S%G71>bring<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, who <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to <S%G2980>say<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the chief <S%G5506>captain<s%> <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> went with him <S%G402>aside<s%> <S%G2596%G2398>privately<s%>, and <S%G4441>asked<s%> him, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> he <S%G2036%G3754>said<s%>, The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> have <S%G4934>agreed<s%> to <S%G2065>desire<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> thou wouldest bring <S%G2609>down<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> to <S%G839>morrow<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4892>council<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> though they <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G4441>inquire<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> more <S%G197>perfectly<s%>.

<S%G3767>But<s%> <S%G3982>do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G3982>yield<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> there lie in wait <S%G1748>for<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> more <S%G4119>than<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G435>men<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> have <S%G332>bound<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> with an <S%G332>oath<s%>, that they <S%G5315>will<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G2193%G3739>till<s%> they have <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> are <S%G1526>they<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%>, looking <S%G4327>for<s%> a <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>.

<S%G3303%G3767>So<s%> the chief <S%G5506>captain<s%> then <S%G630>let<s%> the young <S%G3494>man<s%> <S%G630>depart<s%>, and <S%G3853>charged<s%> him, See thou <S%G1583>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou hast <S%G1718>shewed<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he called <S%G4341>unto<s%> <S%G5100>him<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1543>centurions<s%>, <S%G2036>saying<s%>, Make <S%G2090>ready<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G3704>to<s%> <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2460>horsemen<s%> threescore and <S%G1440>ten<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1187>spearmen<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%>, <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> of the <S%G3571>night<s%>;

<S%G5037>And<s%> <S%G3936>provide<s%> them <S%G2934>beasts<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G1913>set<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1913>on<s%>, and bring him <S%G1295>safe<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5344>Felix<s%> the <S%G2232>governor<s%>.
And he <S%G1125>wrote<s%> a <S%G1992>letter<s%> <S%G4023>after<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G5179>manner<s%>:
<S%G2804>Claudius<s%> <S%G3079>Lysias<s%> unto the most <S%G2903>excellent<s%> <S%G2232>governor<s%> <S%G5344>Felix<s%> sendeth <S%G5463>greeting<s%>.

<S%G5126>This<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> was <S%G4815>taken<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3195>should<s%> have been <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: then came <S%G2186>I<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> an <S%G4753>army<s%>, and <S%G1807>rescued<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, having <S%G3129>understood<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%> a <S%G4514>Roman<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1014>when<s%> I <S%G1014>would<s%> have <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G156>cause<s%> <S%G1223%G3739>wherefore<s%> they <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, I <S%G2609>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2609>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4892>council<s%>:

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> I <S%G2147>perceived<s%> to be <S%G1458>accused<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> laid to his <S%G1462>charge<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G1199>bonds<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when it was <S%G3377>told<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> how <S%G5259>that<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> laid <S%G1917%G3195%G1510>wait<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G435>man<s%>, I <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G1824>straightway<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, and gave <S%G3853>commandment<s%> to his <S%G2725>accusers<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> what they had <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>. <S%G4517>Farewell<s%>.

<S%G3767%G3303>Then<s%> the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%>, <S%G2596>as<s%> it was <S%G1299>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G353>took<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, and <S%G71>brought<s%> him <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G494>Antipatris<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%>On the <S%G1887>morrow<s%> they <S%G1439>left<s%> the <S%G2460>horsemen<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3925>castle<s%>:

<S%G3748>Who<s%>, when they <S%G1525>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G325>delivered<s%> the <S%G1992>epistle<s%> to the <S%G2232>governor<s%>, <S%G3936>presented<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> before <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> when the <S%G2232>governor<s%> had <S%G314>read<s%> the <S%G2532>letter<s%>, he <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1885>province<s%> he <S%G2076>was<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> when he <S%G4441>understood<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2791>Cilicia<s%>;

I will <S%G1251>hear<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>, said <S%G5346>he<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G4675>thine<s%> <S%G2725>accusers<s%> <S%G3854>are<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3854>come<s%>. <S%G5037>And<s%> he <S%G2753>commanded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to be <S%G5442>kept<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2264>Herod's<s%> judgment <S%G4232>hall<s%>.
